short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly save the link address of the current website that you are on or add your own links to save for instant access later on!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save address links of current/active tab on chrome, or add any custom url that you want for later access. Clicking on any saved link will open it in a new tab.
 
Links4Later is a bookmarking system that helps you keep track of website or page urls on the go without the hassle of traditional bookmarks.

You can delete all links with the click of a single button or you can delete a single link by using the trash icon next to it. Individual links can also be copied to clipboard by clicking on the clipboard icon next to each link.
